title: César salad with bullfighting chicken and taqueritos fusion cheese
instructions: Step 1. Salpimentar the chicken breasts and then place some oil in a pan and cook.
Step 2. Once you are ready in pieces.
Step 3. On a plate, place the chopped lettuce to be able to later place the chicken and sprinkle with the Parmesan cheese.
Step 4. Let the taqueritos fall on the salad as if they were crotons.
